item.title: SETroubleshoot Email Notification on SELinux Denial
item.description: I’ve recently installed setroubleshoot-server on my RHEL6 server to help diagnose various SELinux denials as I attempt to secure the box. SETroubleshoot also has an email notification system that is really easy to implement. There are a couple of things that you should consider before going forward. Add the recipient email addresses to /var/lib/setroubleshoot/email_alert_recipients: admin@example.com filter_type=after_first Note: the after_first filter will prevent setroubleshoot from flooding your inbox with the same alert.
